001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Mediator;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Pair;
005
006import java.util.IdentityHashMap;
007import java.util.List;
008import java.util.Map;
009import java.util.Set;
010import java.util.stream.Collectors;
011
012/**
013 * Provides a standard implementation for a neural network.
014 * <p>
015 * A neural network is modeled here as an extensible estimation strategy: it accepts
016 * inputs (features), transforms them through a series of layers composed of {@link Neuron}s
017 * and weighted connections, and produces outputs (predictions).
018 * </p>
019 */
020@Mediator
021public class DefaultNeuralNetwork implements NeuralNetwork {
022
023    private final List<List<? extends Neuron>> layers;
024    private final Map<Neuron, Pair<Integer, Integer>> positions;
025    private final Map<Neuron, List<Pair<Neuron, Float>>> connections;
026
027    /**
028     * Constructs a neural network for the provided layers.
029     *
030     * @param layers the layers of the neural network
031     */
032    public DefaultNeuralNetwork(List<List<? extends Neuron>> layers) {
033        this.layers = layers;
034        this.positions = NeuralNetworks.getNeuronPositions(layers);
035        this.connections = NeuralNetworks.getNeuronConnections(layers);
036    }
037
038    /**
039     * {@inheritDoc}
040     */
041    @Override
042    public int getWidth(int i) {
043        return layers.get(i).size();
044    }
045
046    /**
047     * {@inheritDoc}
048     */
049    @Override
050    public int getDepth() {
051        return layers.size() - 1;
052    }
053
054    /**
055     * {@inheritDoc}
056     */
057    @Override
058    public Neuron getNeuron(int layer, int index) {
059        return layers.get(layer).get(index);
060    }
061
062    /**
063     * {@inheritDoc}
064     */
065    @Override
066    public <N extends Neuron> N getNeuron(int layer, int index, Class<N> classType) {
067        return classType.cast(getNeuron(layer, index));
068    }
069
070    /**
071     * {@inheritDoc}
072     */
073    @Override
074    public Map<Neuron, Float> getOutputConnections(int layer, int index) {
075        Neuron neuron = getNeuron(layer, index);
076        List<Pair<Neuron, Float>> pairs = connections.get(neuron);
077        Map<Neuron, Float> outputConnections = new IdentityHashMap<>();
078        if (pairs != null) {
079            for (Pair<Neuron, Float> pair : pairs) {
080                outputConnections.put(pair.left(), pair.right());
081            }
082        }
083        return outputConnections;
084    }
085
086    @Override
087    public Set<Neuron> getTargetNeurons(Neuron neuron) {
088        List<Pair<Neuron, Float>> pairs = connections.get(neuron);
089        return pairs == null ? Set.of() : pairs.stream().map(Pair::left).collect(Collectors.toSet());
090    }
091
092    /**
093     * {@inheritDoc}
094     */
095    @Override
096    public int getParameterCount() {
097        int parameterCount = 0;
098        for (List<? extends Neuron> layer : layers) {
099            for (Neuron neuron : layer) {
100                if (neuron instanceof InputNeuron) {
101                    continue;
102                }
103                parameterCount += neuron.getWeights().length + 1;
104            }
105        }
106        return parameterCount;
107    }
108
109    /**
110     * {@inheritDoc}
111     */
112    @Override
113    public float[] getParameters() {
114        float[] parameters = new float[getParameterCount()];
115        int i = 0;
116        for (List<? extends Neuron> layer : layers) {
117            for (Neuron neuron : layer) {
118                if (neuron instanceof InputNeuron) {
119                    continue;
120                }
121                for (float weight : neuron.getWeights()) {
122                    parameters[i++] = weight;
123                }
124                parameters[i++] = neuron.getBias();
125            }
126        }
127        return parameters;
128    }
129
130    /**
131     * {@inheritDoc}
132     */
133    @Override
134    public float[] estimate(float... inputs) {
135        for (List<? extends Neuron> layer : layers) {
136            layer.forEach(Neuron::deactivate);
137        }
138        for (int i = 0; i < inputs.length; i++) {
139            ((InputNeuron) layers.get(0).get(i)).setInputValue(inputs[i]);
140        }
141        for (List<? extends Neuron> layer : layers) {
142            layer.forEach(Neuron::activate);
143        }
144        List<? extends Neuron> outputLayer = layers.get(layers.size() - 1);
145        float[] outputs = new float[outputLayer.size()];
146        for (int i = 0; i < outputs.length; i++) {
147            outputs[i] = outputLayer.get(i).getOutput();
148        }
149        return outputs;
150    }
151
152    /**
153     * {@inheritDoc}
154     */
155    @Override
156    public int arity() {
157        return layers.get(0).size();
158    }
159
160    /**
161     * {@inheritDoc}
162     */
163    @Override
164    public int coArity() {
165        return layers.get(layers.size() - 1).size();
166    }
167
168    /**
169     * Accepts a visitor to inspect the complete neural network
170     *
171     * @param visitor the visitor to apply to this network
172     */
173    @Override
174    public void accept(NeuronVisitor visitor) {
175        if (visitor == null) {
176            return;
177        }
178        visitor.enterNetwork(this);
179
180        int depth = getDepth();
181        for (int layer = 1; layer <= depth; layer++) {
182            visitor.enterLayer(this, layer);
183
184            int width = getWidth(layer);
185            for (int j = 0; j < width; j++) {
186                Neuron neuron = getNeuron(layer, j, Neuron.class);
187                visitor.visitNeuron(this, neuron, layer, j);
188
189                Map<Neuron, Float> outs = getOutputConnections(layer, j);
190                if (outs != null) {
191                    for (Map.Entry<Neuron, Float> connection : outs.entrySet()) {
192                        Neuron target = connection.getKey();
193                        Pair<Integer, Integer> targetPosition = positions.get(target);
194                        visitor.visitConnection(this, neuron, layer, j,
195                                target, targetPosition.left(), targetPosition.right(), connection.getValue());
196                    }
197                }
198            }
199
200            visitor.exitLayer(this, layer);
201        }
202
203        visitor.exitNetwork(this);
204    }
205}
